Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 60h Indiana.
ShortDescription: Westbound 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near 60th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, Indiana, 59th including the normal route streets  due to street blockage near 60th/Indiana.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due to an earlier track condition.

Allow extra travel time.
